content: if you re looking for an easy halloween pattern look no further this crochet witch cat plush pattern could be just the thing this cat pattern will make adorable halloween decorations and if you re not an expert at sewing don t worry - this is a low-sew pattern make this cat for your next market or if you have to finish a last-minute gift this amigurumi cat pattern takes less than 1h30m to crochet and assemble the amigurumi cat toy is small and easy to make perfect for any weight yarn including popular blanket/velvet yarn ►this listing is an original pdf pattern -written in english using us terminology- to crochet your own amigurumi cat the pattern does not contain the basic course of crocheting you should already have the basic knowledge ►the crochet cat in this listing is made with light worsted weight yarn but the toys can be made with plush yarn ►pattern includes detailed instructions with plenty of photo references to instruct you on how to make the crochet hippo step by step ►finished crochet toy pattern if made with recommended yarn and hook is 12cm/4 72inches ► hook size 3 0mm - amount of yarn +/- 70g ► skill level intermediate → pattern details ← * you will receive one pdf files upon purchase of this listing witches cat is easy to crochet and assemble this easy-to-follow crochet pattern the halloween cat is excellent for any beginner and advanced crocheter get this cute cat pattern for your next market prep ►important this pattern is for personal use only you do not have permission to recopy rewrite or redistribute this pattern in any form as your own or otherwise you may not resell my patterns but you are welcome to sell any of the items made from my patterns happy crocheting you are most welcome to contact me if you have any questions about the pattern i would love to see your finished toy as well you can tag me on instagram @yarnoverwithnatasha
